com.ephesoft.gxt.core.server.security.service

Interface AuthenticationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAuthenticator, SSOAuthenticator, SSODatabaseAuthenticator

    public interface AuthenticationService
    Provides authentication services required for ephesoft.

    It provides all the services in accordance to the configuration provided in the web.xml through authenticationType parameter.

    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 18-Nov-2013

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String logout(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
      Logged out of the application by in-validating the session.
      void setUserDetails(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest, javax.servlet.FilterConfig filterConfig)

    • Method Detail

      • logout

        java.lang.String logout(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
        Logged out of the application by in-validating the session.
        Parameters:
        httpServletRequest - HttpServletRequest request used to invalidate the session.
        Returns:
        String URL where user needs to be redirected after logging out.

      • setUserDetails

        void setUserDetails(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest,
                  javax.servlet.FilterConfig filterConfig)
        Sets the user details in the session from the parameters fetched from request or filter configurations.
        Parameters:
        httpServletRequest - HttpServletRequest request attribute used for saving the user details in the session.
        filterConfig - FilterConfig for retrieving configured parameters in the web.xml.
